section.title: What is new?
section.para: You can find some changes on core components of Pardus &PRODVER;, for other addtional changes please see here.

listitem.para: NetworkManager is updated to &NMVER;.
Problems about adding VPN connections have been fixed.
Handle WLAN security passwords gracefully while upgrading distribution.
ModemManager is updated to &MMVER;.
Improvements for Samsung modems
Support access technology reporting for Qualcomm Gobi modems
Fix communication with Nokia N900 devices
Support multiple CDMA Rm protocols
Fix handling of Option access technology reporting
Fix handling of CDMA EVDO registration states
Fix problems reconnecting Ericsson F5521gw modems
Better handling of some Android handset modem
cups - cups is updated to &CUPSVER;.
LibreOffice is updated to &LIBREVER;
Fixed crash closing document with footnotes
Allow multi-range copy from VBA (Calc)
Fix for crash with hidden column in Data->Form (Calc)
Prevent crash at column row boundaries (Calc)
Enable l10n of presenter screen (Presenter Screen Extension)
Correctly detect documents with xlk extension as Excel binary
Missing icon in Styles and Formatting dialog (Impress)
Set correct mimetype for draw documents on xml export (Draw)
You can check out LibreOffice web page for more information.
MPlayer/libass: Fixed crash playing subtitled videos which was triggered by freetype 2.4.6 security update.
